content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on the couch in my living room looking out the picture glass window at about 10:45am on sunday, august 13, 2006.  i was looking at the clouds and saw this thing in the clouds that i thought was a plane at first.  i began to watch it move erratically.  stopping, going backwards quickly, then going forward again.  then it went through a cloud made a very quick turn to the south west and accelerated very fast till it was out of view.  it was cigar shaped, metallic, looked like a silver color.  it was rounded at the corners.  looked like it could maneuver very well.  way more than any commercial or military aircraft i have seen.  made no sound.  that i would hear out the screens of the window anyway.  i lost track of it when it accelerated to the south west very fast and went beyond my scope of view(trees).
content.summary: Cigar shaped sphyrical craft erratcially moving around and then zipped across the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
I was sleeping . and about 2:30. am i was awakend by a low humming or a buzzing noise . when i looked around my bed room i had seen a bright light that filled my room . and i noticed that a yellow flashing beacon ( rotating type .) type light was going across the walls of my room . i got up out of my bed and i looked out through the blinds and and window i saw that the yard to the west was lit up . i went to the front room and something caught my attention to look out the kitchen window . ( this is to the east ) and being that we had a good moon , all i saw that it was not not as bright as the window from my bedroom . then i looked to the front of the house where the front room is and i saw our drawblinds swinging left to right with a brightness of daylight . ( note   our air conditioner was on and running . ) for some reason i started laughing . i knew what has happend . my wife and grandson was sleeping in the front room and our dog was there . he had growled earlier and i had heard him and thought he was having a dream . but when i started to go to the front door , something was telling me that it was ok . go back to sleep i did not see anybody i wanted to see the ufo . or object that made the light . 
 i started to go to the door again and it seemed that something took my hand and led me back to my bed . i did not see anybody there . i went back to sleep and the next morning i woke up and felt like i had a good nights sleep i felt refreshed . i then got me a cup of coffee and sat down to watch the today show . when i started to take a sip of my coffee i noticed that the hair on my right arm was standing up on ends . i thought it was wierd then i looked at my left arm and it was the same way . after a while my hairs on my arms settled down .  
the only thing i regret is i did not get to see what the object was . 
 thank you 
       ronald donoval
content.summary: See below .

content.detailedDescription:
I have never really believed in ufos. i was sitting in the backroom of the house smoking a cigarette when i noticed clouds form. i guess i noticed the clouds because i had went threw a tornado months before and i am paranoid of the weather now.

anyway as i was smoking and looking at this cloud form i saw a tear drop looking object fly out from the cloud. it shot out so fast that if i had blinked i would have missed it. it glowed real bright as a light blue color then a dark red then a bright yellow before it was out of my view.

it show down behind the tree tops and that was the last i saw of it. i was so shocked at what i saw that i ran into the kitchen and told my dad who i am taking care of. of coarse he didnt believe me. i walked back into that same room to finish my cigarette that i had layed down in the ask tray.

as i was sittiing there looking at the sky and that same cloud i had the creeps and my hair stood on end. i was still freaked out. i was thinking i wish i had my camcorder at that time. then it had maybe been 5 minutes after i saw the thing that i seen airplanes go by. i remeber thinking that maybe they were looking for that thing i had seen.

i didnt give my name because if it got out that i reported this in this town people would run me out. i did give my e-mail if you want to ask me questions. and if you want i will take pictures of the area i seen it fly.

just wanted someone to know because it was on my mind so much. that saying seeing is believeing is true. now i dont know what to think of life.



p.S. i found this site from the history channle.
i am attaching a scetch i did. i am not a good artist.
content.summary: Tear shaped with a long tail, flashed colors, blue, red, and yellow

content.detailedDescription:
Four red lights

while in the us navy in the summer of 1986, i was standing lookout aboard the uss edenton ats 1 (currently decommissioned).  the lookout watch, stood outside on top the bridge of the ship, and was responsible for reporting all contacts seen both in the water and sky.  it was around eleven p.M. one clear night at sea, located about fifty miles off the coast of cape hatteras, nc.  during one of my scans of the night sky, out of know where, four red circular lights appeared.  the lights where hundreds of yards apart from each other and formed a square.  at first, i thought it was four separate air craft, such as, military helicopters because the lights were stationary; however, due to the distance from the ship, the lights where too large to be aircraft running lights.  there were also no other normal running lights like green and white, which make-up the normal outline of an aircraft seen at night.  the lights where located about twenty degrees above the horizon and about a mile away from the ship.  again, these four red lights were each about the size of a small plane, which were very bright and visible in the night sky.  the night sky was also clear, moon lit, and a moderate amount of stars were visible, which also aided in calculating the distance and size of these lights.  as stated, when i first saw these lights they were all stationary in the sky and appeared out of know where.  once i noticed that these were not normal lights, grouped in a square and not moving, i called down to the bridge over a salt and pepper line informing the conning officer of a possible ufo sighting.  this brought laughter across the wire at first, but i relayed the contact again in a stern but excited voice, which succeeded in getting the bridge officers attention.  after relaying the contact information a second time, the four lights, in a flash, darted towards the horizon amazingly fast.  the lower two lights in the square went first, with the top two lights following directly behind them in a curved swooshing motion and there was no sound. then all four shot straight up into outer-space and out of sight, all within a split second.  at this point, i felt very excited and shocked, and was personally praying someone on the bridge had seen what i just saw.  having been an avid watcher of the night sky, seen shooting stars and a believer in that life has to exist somewhere out there, i become even more excited because i knew, i just saw my first unidentified flying object(s).  to my amazement, when i returned to the bridge after my watch, i was very pleased to learn that the conning officer and everyone else on the bridge had seen this sighting and logged it into the ship���s log as a ufo sighting.  next, after a half hour had passed since the sighting, the radiation detection system (gamma roentgen meter) on the bridge started making a loud clicking sound. at first, no one seemed to know what was making this sound then a very loud bell went off notifying us as to what was going on, we were being radiated.  when the instrument stopped clicking, it indicated we had taken a hit of 385 roentgens in the period of about one minute.  at this point, the captain of the ship was awoken and called to the bridge, as well as the chief in charge of the radiation metering equipment onboard ship.  the captain was not impressed with an entry of a ufo sighting being placed in the ship���s log, and at first, took the roentgen meter as being defective.  however, the chief informed the captain that the meter had been serviced and calibrated the day before and that other like meters throughout the ship had just gone off indicating the same amount of roentgens received as the bridge.  the captain stated not to log the instance concerning the radiation exposure and left the bridge.  during the rest of my watch duty that night, no officer or enlisted person spoke of what happened, and also acted liked nothing happened.  this experience, however, was etched into my memory as if it happened yesterday and i have told this story to only a few people, people who i thought would believe me.  this is also the first time i have documented the events of this night.
  
in conclusion, as an indication of the strength of gamma radiation, i and others received that night; all the personnel during the project trinity experiments conducted in 1945 at ground zero, only received between 1 and 6 total roentgens of gamma radiation.  this leads me to believe, we traveled through the wake of radiation produced by the ufos seen thirty minutes earlier.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Four red lights were seen in the night sky hundreds of yards apart from each other,

content.detailedDescription: One night my brother & i were hanging out in my mom's driveway smoking a cigarette & talking about ufo's(the subject always seems to come up when we're outdoors & the night sky is clear)& we started scanning the sky. we only saw the usual airplanes & helicopters that we're so used to because we lived so close to the airport so i told my brother i was going to bed because i had to work the next day. he said he was going to stay out a bit longer & that he would come tell me if he saw something. about ten minutes later he comes in & tells me to go out & see some lights that were acting kind of funny, but i told him to make sure it was something good, so he comes back in about ten minutes later & says that i should really take a look. i put some shoes & a shirt on & went out to see what it was. we were out there looking around for a couple minutes when we see these two lights that resembled those of an airplane, but as we continued to watch(i keep saying "we" because after everything happened i drilled my bro about what he saw & it matched what i had seen)they seemed alittle odd. as they got closer we noticed they were'nt blinking or anything, so we kept watching. when the lights got close enough to where they were about an inch & a half apart, which is where an airplane would be visible to us being in that area so close to the airport, they instantly turned into one light directly in the middle. my brother & i were like " what the *%$@, did you see that?". well, the light just kept on coming & when it was about the size of a dime & almost directly over us it went out like someone hit a light switch. but we kept looking, then we saw what it really was. it was a silent, transparent ship flying over us! there was this weird sensation & this sort of hum, kinda of like power lines make but it was more like a feeling than sound. scared the crap out of us because it was so low that i felt i could have hit it if i would have chucked a rock at it, & it was flying at about the speed of a blimp, not to mention that we had never seen anything like it except in the movies. while it was flying over us we could see an outline of the ship but we could also see the stars right through it! man, if there was only a machine that could playback memories! it was the shape of a bullet but flat on the bottom & tall, no wings. it had two fins on the top rear section & like this jet booster type thing in the back, which like i said, made no noise & didn't emit any light. it was weird man, i could see the outline of one of the fins through the other & the stars through it all! as it flew over us we both kind of shrinked back as if it would see us if we did't. it continued over us going from north to south & as it started to pass my moms house it turned back to one light, then alittle further it turned back into two lights like it had began. after that it dipped down towards the horizon so we couldn't see over my moms house anymore & we were already across the street. so as we start walking back across the street, we see it zooming towards the airport which is east of us, then instantly it starts zooming west faster than i have ever seen anything fly before. after that we didn't see it anymore, but we stood up for about two hours talking & looking. like i said before, afterwards i drilled my brother & we both saw the same thing. my heart was pounding through the whole experience. i've had other sightings as well, but that was one of the longest & closest ever. hope this info helps in any way possible. i am also after the truth.
content.summary: One night my younger brother & i saw something in the sky that neither one of us will ever forget!

content.detailedDescription: I was in a car with my girlfriend and my friend. we stopped to say hi to some friends we saw. while i was sitting in the car i saw a yellow round object in the sky that seemed unusual. i told everybody about it and we all looked up at it trying to figure out what it could be. as we stood there, the yellow light started to fade away but twinkling at the same time and as this was happening there was a cloud like shaped c that was to the right of the object. wen it faded away the cloud also faded away. as we stood there, like 5 seconds later, the yellow light appeared again but this time is was brighter. after a few seconds it began to turn red and as it changed colors the object got smaller. the object turned red and slowly faded away twinkling. this time the object never appeared again. nobody knew what it was but i had a great feeling it was a ufo. all together this event took around 3 to 4 minutes. the object never moved from the spot. at first i thought it could have been one of those poles that have the yellow light blinking from it but it was way too high in the air and there arent any light poles there, thats what made me believe it was a ufo and because of the actions it was making. if you need any questions, there was about 15 people in all who saw this event.
content.summary: Yellow object appeared few hundred feet in there air n faded away

content.detailedDescription:
Traveling south from oklahoma city to lawton on i-44. i noticed something in the sky. the object appeared to be moving from east to west.
what caught my eye was the shimmer of direction change. the shimmer was very
subtle. it appeared to be white in color, didnt really appear to be very reflective. the object appeared to be rectangular or cigar shapped. the object appeared to turn south-southwest, and leave at an high rate of speed. object was gone within 1-2 seconds after it made the turn. wife was in the vehicle asleep. woke her up to make note of sighting. decided to report after watching a program on the history channel. one of the opening pictures looked  very similar to the object i had seen.
content.summary: Rectangular, object sighted over i-44

content.detailedDescription: It was july 22 of 2005 when i saw my first ufo. we left from laredo tx, at 9:00 pm we were on our way to visit relatives in california, it was my dad,brother,step mom,& two step sister's. i stayed up the whole way because we made it a plan to stop in marfa tx to see the mysterious lights.  well it was 4:00 am and we were at the viewing point right before u get into marfa tx. we all got off our suburban and there were very few so called,(mysterious lights out). i had been passed there about 4 years before. well it got boring so i suggested that we just hit the road, i was sitting in the middle row of the suburban looking out the left door window when we pulled out i stayed looking out towards the mountains looking at the (mysterious lights) still. and as i was gazing the whole range out of no where i noticed  two lights blinking at just 1 pulse both lights at the same time just like a plane parallel the lights were,low it looked like it was floating very slowly. and i then said out loud "look, check that out is that a plane". but i had a feeling it wasnt because i'v never seen an airplane move that slow. then my dad and i were both looking out driving when i noticed it had raised way higher in the sky and thats when the third light came on and all three lights started flashing (like strobing) these light were in the shape of a triangle. when it started to flash eratically i told my dad  to stop so we could record it on video camera and i was the one who was recording. as i was recording one car did pass by looking out too, driving, by really slow. these triangular lights stayed flashing for about 20 mins, i recorded my first time about 10 to 12 mins and then my father said lets just go so we left i was still trying to record while we were driving , but we told my dad that this was rare to see something like this we had to stop to see what else it would do. so we stopped again and i started recording again and i noticed that it had rotated while we were driving the first recording i remembered seeing 2 lights at the bottom and one at the top, the second time i got down to record i noticed it was the other way around. during this whole expearience i was thinking of how nobody was going to believe me, during the whole recording i was saying its a f****** ufo this is crazy, and then we had enough seen enough to know so we got back in the suburban and hit the road again and about half 3/4ths a mile it decended back to the way i had seen it the first time very low and the 3rd light was like it was never there. the object drifted or floated the opposite way for a long ways we drove a couple of miles and when i looked back i could still see the two lights smaller of course   but they were still flying our skies. when we got to california we showed our family my older cousins the video there was one good frame where u paused the video and u could see 3 white lights like a triangle. well my dad took the girls to disney land and the girls recorded over the 20 mins of footage. i would of put the video on this website i am very upset. (but to this day i have seen another strange light appear in the sky out of no where huge ball of light in one spot, slowley start to dim but as its dimming its starts flying east like the light slowley turned off like a (dimmer)). thanks for letting me share my expearience with mufon i will try to get you all a video.
content.summary: Started flyin towards us in the sky a distance away at first it was only two lights parrallel from one another then it seems like it hovered higher and thats when the third light created a triangle and all three lights were erraticall flashing

content.detailedDescription:
I saw you guys on the news - here's one for your books...

i was about 13.5 years old and had snuck out of the house late at night armed with eggs and chinese stars and wearing dark sweats.  my goal was to sneak across the empty lot at the corner of overview and curtis to valley view cove to egg the house of my foe.

i made my way across the yard and hid behind the stone mailbox of the house next door to our house (3708 curtis).  there is streetlight there and i wanted to check to make sure no cars were coming from any direction.  

with the coast clear, i then stepped forward towards the edge of the street.  that���s when this ball of light zipped up the hill (curtis) and stopped in front of me. 

the ball: it was a spherical soft white, swirling sort of mist with no definite outer enclosure. it had a translucent tail that chased up the hill and caught up to it after it stopped.  it was brighter towards the center of the ball.

i had about 1 second to view the object, about enough time to feel the most fear i have ever felt.  it then zoomed off to the right leaving a tail that soon chased it all the way down the street and then taking a hard left on carmel and out of sight.  the whole time it maintained a level distance above the street. its speed was about 200mph.

i ran back inside my house and soon became interested in weather phenomena.  what is even more stunning is that i saw it one more time in the middle of the day that following weekend while hanging my head out of the upstairs bathroom window.  it stopped in front of our mailbox too (after stopping at the neighbors again) and it looked the same only not as bright in the day.  it was scary to see it from a distance and know that i had been right next to it in that exact spot.

i finally brought the story up at dinner and my father made fun of me. my brother spoke up saying that he had seen it while looking out of the front window by the front door. it had stopped in front of the mailbox.  he said he hid a closet for a long time, but never saw it again and neither did i.

perhaps other folks in the neighborhood have seen it over the years, or perhaps people who lived there back then saw it. it seems likely. perhaps it was an unidentified form of life and feeding or maybe it was an electrical phenomenon following an underground electrical line.

it could have been a ufo probe mapping out the subdivision development.  what sucks is that i do not know what it was, but i do know that i saw it and that it was real.  it is the sort of thing that makes a person feel really, really small.

in summary, i���d suggest focusing your efforts on why as opposed to what.  if there is alien life around us, they are lurking about for a reason.  maybe they are deep in the ocean mining out resources we don���t even know we need for our own development.  but we should be glad that we are still alive as a race if alien life is among us.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: A ball of light came up the hill and stopped in front of my face at arms length and then zoomed off!

content.detailedDescription: First was at family gathering 8-10 years old ant had binoculas so was looking around at clouds when i noticed a silver oval from west going east in and out of cloud over and over at least 4 times coundn't even get adult's to look.   years lster around 13i and a freind were out side at night (alway's were) we noticed lites from western skies seem yo apear and move 20 30 sec. to eastern side then disapeer over 21 times . a little freeky we thought so we grab our beebe guns we stated to walk to his aunts house a few blocks away through empty lot walking west when a very intence hair standing up on the back of my neck feeling as i turned my head back a brite lite seemed fairly low hard to tell alt. so fast i just followed it out of western hem.     what i saw when i was 8-10 i saw on tv a mexican news crew filmed exactly what i saw
content.summary: More than one over live 1 8-9 silver disk in +out of cloud repetedly binoculars 2counted over 21 objects from west hem to eastern hem then later hair on back of neck +then flew from behind me over  +freind as fast as i could follow

content.detailedDescription: I was a nocona texas police back in the mid 80s, i drove west of town on hwy 82, when i turned around goming back to town going east i looked up in the sky about 1:00 aclock high looking east, it looked like the flying disc you see in the movies, it rocked back and forth then shot out of site at a very high rate of speed. i just made a small note on my patrol log and did not tell any one about it. about three months later my department posted a phone number to call if we saw any ufos. another time i was down in the nocona air port its in a valley very low, i was out side my patrol vehicle, i saw a bright light very high in the sky it went horison to horison in about 60 sec. i thouht it was neat to see a ufo but did not tell any one for a long time, end of report.
content.summary: Was on patrol on west side of nocona tx coming up hill saw silver disc about 1:00 aclock high

content.detailedDescription:
I was out in our back yard and heard a humming sound and look in our back
yard and saw this object. i hooverd in the back yard for about 4 mins
it was about 40 ft. in dia.  and the cone was about 18 foot tall..
i saw this at a dist. of about 300 ft away.

when ran in the house to tell my mon and dad and came out
the disc. it was gone.


i few years ago...I was a book on ufo and
there was photo of other ufo.. and i saw simllar photos
of what i saw that summer night..

phil
content.summary: Disc shape with cone in middle and the was like a white light

content.detailedDescription: I was taking my little dog outside for her nightly bathroom break. i was looking at the sky while my dog did her business because there was a meteor shower. i noticed what i thought was a plane with the blinking lights. i watched it, waiting for it to move on. but as i was watching it didnt move forward but instead moved directly upward, then moved back down. then it looked almost like it rocked side to side, all the while the lights are flashing in some kind of pattern. they would blink fast, in white, then redish tone, then maybe a blue, hard to see. my sister came outside and i told her to bring in our dog & come see this in the sky. she was also shocked by the unforward movement, we both just stared for a while. it moved up, then down, then almost side to side. about half an hour later, 3 other people (a friend & 2 relatives) decided to come see what we were doing. all of us were at a loss as to what this was in the sky. the pattern remained the same. we all decided to get in our cars and go to a boat launch nearby to see if we could get a better view. when we arrived, we soon noticed that there were 2 objects, doing the exact same thing. hovering, almost, then moving up and down. we then noticed that when one would blink in a rapid pattern the other would blink normally, and vice versa. after another 1 hour, hour and a half they began to ascend upwards, sometimes in a fast shot to another spot. they slowly began to become hard to see so we decided to hear home. about 2 hours later we walked our friend to her car and walked out to the street to see if the lights were still there, but they were both gone. we repeatedly tried to take pictures but it was so dark that nothing came out. personally, i am stumped and shocked by what i saw. i am not a person who believes in anything  until i see proof. i didn't really believe that aliens visited us, though i know we are not alone in the universe. but i am seriously reconsidering my thoughts. i cannot say for sure, but there was something unexplainable in the sky. 5 of us saw it.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: 2 objects, blinking in synchronization. moving up and down but not forward. lights were in sequence.

content.detailedDescription: I am a sixty year old marine corps veteran who has watched the skies since i was a teenage ground observation corps volunteer (skywatch). i do not drink nor take drugs which would interfere with my vision. i hesitated for several weeks to report this anamolous phenomenon because sky conditions have not been ideal -- thunderstorms and clouds, not to mention the urban light scatter that makes observations in atlanta difficult. however this sighting has repeated itself a dozen times in the last few weeks and i felt compelled to report it. in each occurance several hovering lights have been observed out of my bedroom window which faces almost due east. this view looks out on a main air traffic corridor in and out of atl (hartsfield-jackson international) and pdk (peachtree dekalb). on these evenings i would observe the normal comings and goings of the aircraft, with their landing lights, wing lights, strobes, etc. and what i observed was obviously not an aircraft. at first i thought they were stars but then i remembered there was a high overcast which covered the stars.  i would see one perhaps two lights hovering in position from just above the horizon, perhaps ten degrees, up to almost directly above. on one or two occasions the light would appear just after a flash like a strobe,   the lights, which varied from a reddish white to a bluish white, would remain stationary for thirty seconds to five minutes, then would fade and in their place a line of lights would appear, usually canted from the horizontal, like a wing making a turn, or sometimes three tiny red lights would appear in the same spot in the shape of a triangle, equilateral or isocoles, not sure, but sure it was regular.  then would morph back into a light and move quickly, probably too quickly for an aircraft, to the northwest or southwest and out of view directly across the flight patterns of two airports. it is extremely difficult to estimate altitude but would not be surprised if they were manuvering over fifty thousand feet. as i mentioned the cloud cover made it difficult to track them completely across the sky but the consistency of the pattern is remarkable. it did not seem to exhibit the flight characteristics of an airplane (unless a harrier jumpjet which is highly inprobable) or a helicopter or a satellite.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Single light that morphs into line of lights or triangle, then back to a light and speeds away.

content.detailedDescription: I was outside this past sunday morning on my front porch. it was a deep blue, clear morning sky in se michigan when i noticed what appeared to be a star shining brightly in the sw horizon above some trees.  but as the object was framed by the trees,  i noticed that this object was moving left to right, then stopping and then accelarating in different directions, moving slightly again and stopping.  i then realized that i was witnessing something unusual.  i ran into the house and grabbed my camera and video taped the object for about :10 seconds.  the object was white, not metallic or silver.  bright white.  it also had a very peculiar appendage that jetted out from the bottom.  this appendage was clearly hooked and the appendage rotated intermittenly, as if propelling the object. no other way to explain it.  a friend commented that it looked like a white cat being hung by it's tail the way the appendage wiggled about (see photo). weird, i know, but that is what it looked like.  the object made no noise, but then again, it was very far off.  i would judge that this object were about 15,000 feet up and several miles away.  it was not windy at all outside.  i have attached 3 photos for your review.  in the video i shot, this object moves left to right in a south to north direction, quickly, then abruptly stops, then accelarates off quickly until it gets next to the tree line, from my view, then slowly dissappeared behind the trees out of view.  at first i thought this might be a balloon, but it was very, very high and made very deliberate moves, stopping and starting again, with no wobble.  also, the hook like appendage that was moving!!!!  did anyone else see this?  very cool.  thank you...
content.summary: White, balloon like object with downward, hooked appendage in daylight

content.detailedDescription: Some friends and i were standing on my porch, near a creek, and about 1/2 mile north of soda springs ski hill. the porch faced east and south. it was near midnight. we were talking , when somebody said, "look at that!" i looked where they were pointing, which was toward the ski hill. there was a large blimp shaped object flying west to east, over the ridge, at about 200 feet above the ridge. i was approximately 200 feet long and 70-80 feet in diameter. it had a row of lights, or lighted windows, running along the horizontal axis. it was completely silent. as it passed, you could see a glowing tube in the back, going into the rear of the ship, glowing orange. it was apparently part of a propulsion system which may have been cooling off, not in use, or in use operating at a low thrust setting. i am not completely sure, but the windows may have been lights; my initial perception was that i could just barely make out rectangular windows and that there was an inside barely visible through the windows, but the sighting was less that 20 seconds, and then it was receding out of sight to the east. i said, "let's follow it!" and 4 of us raced up stairs to my car.(my apartment was down a set of stairs to a lower level above a creek). by the time we got to the car the craft was almost out of sight to the east and we were not able to keep up with it, and lost sight of it after driving only a half mile or so. i am glad we were unable to follow it, in retrospect. after returning to the house, we drew pictures of what we saw, and then showed them to each other. it was pretty enlightening to see the pictures were very similar. there was some discussion of windows or lights, but all saw lights and some saw them as lighted windows. we definately ruled out terrestrial blimps, and agreed we had seen a ufo.
content.summary: Watermelon/blimp shape with light row down central axis

content.detailedDescription: My sister and i were standing on snow at soda springs, california, near lake van norden. this is about 12 miles west of truckee, california. it was bright daylight. i saw a movement above me and thought it was a jet at first, but looking directly at it, i saw it was more than one vehicle. i observed 5 objects flying east to west at high altitude, and pointed them out to her, and she saw them also. they were intertwining with each other as they flew, like an elaborate aerial maneuver for no obvious purpose. there was no sound. they objects were rounded and silver colored. due to the extreme altitude and distance, i could make out no other details. they were moving at a very high rate of speed, and covered the full sky until out of sight, in less than 30 seconds. the altitude where we were is about 6500 feet. we discussed the sighting, and concluded it was not geese, aircraft we knew of, or anything else known to us. it was the speed, and intertwining that made it probable we had just seen a flight of ufos.
content.summary: Flight of 5 objects

content.detailedDescription:
Friday during work i had noticed highflying military jets all day long over our area.
so i knew something was going on so when i got finished with my work about 4:30pm before heading home i decide to take some snapshots of the sky all around and this is what i captured. i took a couple of photos of this area and it was in one photo only.
this photo was taken in the same area i saw three white disks moving west last saturday on aug 5, 2006 around the same time. i've also included a photo of the exact spot where i saw the disks last week and drew them in with photoshop to show what they looked like. when they got to my 9:00 position they just disappeared or blended back into the sky.
the same with this disk i didn't see it with the naked eye but the camera can see them.
this area has been very active with ufo's since may 2006
i'm now discovering that if i see high flying military jets above that they are looking at something so then its time to get out a camera and see what shows up like this photo.
content.summary: Black disk caputred in photo in delray beach, florida

content.detailedDescription:
My cousin and i were sat upstairs at my grandmother's house. we were just talking casually when i looked out of the window, over the hills of the peak district national park, of which my grandmothers house looks over. i saw a glowing white object traveling quite slowly. the object started speeding up as it went past the house. it was quite far away, probably about half a mile, at fist i thought a small plane might be crash landing, however the object remained in the air. it gained speed at an incredible rate, something i have never seen before, and as it flew off a bright white/blue light filled the room. the event was over as sudden as it had started.

my cousin and i both looked at one another and she said," did you see that, the room just lit up!" she was facing the wrong way to see the ufo and only caught the last glimpse of it as it flew off in a lightning burst. i told her what i had seen and she said she had seen something similar a couple of days before over the peak district. similar shape and bright white/blue colour. 

we would have reported this sighting earlier, however only found out about mufon today.
content.summary: Glowing, bright blue/white disc

content.detailedDescription: I saw this elongated light moving not too very fast almost straight overhead moving north to south in the daytime in a clear blue sky. i had my camera with me and took two shots of it within 10 to 15 seconds of each other. i am attaching the first original shot and an enlargement of it. i am also attaching the enlargement of the second shot. i tried to take a third shot but the object had disappeared. there is not room here to attach the original of the second shot although a mufon investigator has it for reference.
content.summary: Light in daytime sky moving north to south

content.detailedDescription: It has been many years since the ordeal, but i'll try to recall each moment, the best to my ability. i awoke about 12:50 a.M. i was 17 or 18 years old at the time of the event. i was lying in bed and at first i thought that the strobing lights were an indication that there was a storm on the way. so, i just went back to sleep. an hour later, i woke back up, feeling a little uneasy and queezy. i triied awaking my parents, but they eventually got very upset and scalded me for triing to get them out of bed. i then went throughout our house looking out toward each window, only to find just clouds in the sky, appearing to be over my house. the front living room windows was no lights what-so-ever. but turning my head toward the patio, (even with the shade down) was this strobing light. i was apprehensive to go toward the kitchen and so on. but i kept walking anyway. our house became colder, the deeper that i walked toward our back den door. i then became chilled, i lifted up the shade to the back door. and the lights were still going. i reached and touched the door knob,and felt chills up my spine. i ran back through my house (scared half to death) opened my bible, that had not been opened in months. the new book opened right up to psalm 91. i began reading my bible for the fist time (other than revelations) every night. i stayed awake for the rest of the night. the next week in my typing class, where my teacher always kept the daily paper. on the front page read: "lights reported over miami oklahoma" with a donut shaped cloud photo on the cover. i lived in moore at the time. i am putting this report in because i hope that someone will remember the event and also, include their story of this happening. thank you.
content.summary: "from my back yard windows it was 'strobing bright lights'  for an hour or more, but in front windows, was no lights. "

content.detailedDescription:
Dates and times are approx. since i don't remember exact dates of either event since it was a long time ago and i tried to forget it.

i didn't want to ever admit to what i saw that morning...I was driving to the paint store to meet my boss and pick up supplies...I was driving down the street when i saw a very large craft hovering about 1,000 feet above the ground...Approx. 1 mile away....It was very bright and attracted my sight once it came into view in the morning sky...I drove into the parking lot of the paint store and jumped out of my van and ran to the front of the building...My boss and another coworker followed me...Floating in the air...Making no sound was a craft approx. 200 feet wide...Very bright with a very black orb circling the outside center of the craft..All 3 of us couldn't believe our eyes and stood there in amazement, wondering what it was..It floated off due east at a fairly slow pace. we have never talked about it...I haven't seen the other witnesses for years...But when i did bring it up with my boss...He told me to never bring it up again. as far as i could tell..It was of no technolgy that humans posess.

i know this may sound crazy...I had another sighting around 1984 while working out by the airport at geiger heights...I was going home on i-90...It was very early in the morning..When i saw a jet flying fairly low above flying parallel to the freeway and getting ready to land when 3 metallic balls about 6' around came up under the plane and stayed with it til it flew out of site...I pulled over as well as 1 other car...The driver stepped out and said "did you see that? what the heck was that?" i wasn't sure what i saw...But i can tell you...I saw 3 metallic balls fly up under a jet landing at the airport..

being of rational mind...I can come to the conclusion that what i saw was indeed ufo's
content.summary: Large glowing, bright (almost metallic ) retangular ufo

content.detailedDescription: This all happen in front of my eyes my band went on a tour to livermore,cali i was siting in the passenger seat and my husband was driving my guitar player was awake he would fall asleep then wake up to make sure we were awake. it was around 11:30pm and i was wide awake making sure my husband wouldn't fall asleep on the road. i was looking in the sky at the stars it was so clear that night and i was liseing to music and watching in front of me the rest of the way. i saw something leaving from the ground like how an airplane takes off it was about 100 feet from me not far at all. i was like oh cool airplane i love watching how they take off but then in my head i was like wait we are in the middle of the desert nothing around nothing but dirty and little plants that's when i told my husband look was is that as it was going more up in the sky the lights came on there were blue lights then white lights then that's when it happend it started moving in a circle spinning up sidedown twisting so crazy i was like how is that happening nothing spins like that. my guitar player was like what the hell is that! i was crying out loud i was freaked out my husband almost hit the car next to us i was like drive! the car next to us moved more behind us i'm sure they saw what we did. then when it was done twisting it was coming towards us the white lights were so bright it was like looking at the car i think and it turned back where it came up from the floor when it first took off when it went back it went so fast! on the ground my guitar player is like its going to crash but it didn't it came back up and just hovered the ground my guitar player got that part of camera we wanted to record the whole thing but we were so scared that we forgot we had a camera. as we were driving away it was still hovering the ground but then we didn't see it after that. we stop to get food i woke everyone else up my bass player,drummer and second guitar player i was like screaming wake up! and we told them and i was crying the whole time and everyone was scared. when we got are food we asked what city is before this we were in bakers field when we got are food he was like kern county i remember seeing that sign before we saw the ufo and i was telling the guy no after that he was like nothing.... i said nothing?!  and the guy said its nothing but dirty and plants its not a county or anything so we thought that was scary. ive seen other types of ufos but not like this, i could not understand this one and it was to close in my face that i cant sleep like i use to i freak out thinking what is that did it see me i don't think i will ever understand what it was but its was in between kern county and bakersfield.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Triangle looking with blue and white lights moved very fast

content.detailedDescription:
Last night at around 10:00pm i was on my laptop in the living room on the couch, had been for close to an hour. my kids were upstairs in their rooms and my husband was in his lazy boy next to me watching espn. my dog came into the living room straight to me and stared, wagging her tail. i set my laptop on the sofa cushion next to me and grabbed her leash by the door, taking her outside to go to the bathroom. as i shut the door behind me and got about half way to her tie out the full moon in the east grabbed my attention right away. it was beautiful!  i hooked her up, came inside, grabbed my camera and tripod, completely forgetting my laptop was on, went back out and set up in the drive way. i have a digital konica minolta dimage z6, 6.0 megapixels with a 12 x anti shake optical zoom. i live in the country so i have a pretty good view of the stars with no interference from city lights. i stood out there and managed to get 44 still shots of the moon and clouds altogether. at 10:19pm, as i was in the midst of taking the moon shots a light blast of cold air hit me from above. it wasn���t a normal breeze, this was a light blast of cold that hit the very top of my head traveling down to my feet. yes there was a slight breeze last night as i stood there and took the pictures of the moon, but this was different. it was cold and only lasted for a second. right away i looked straight up above me into the night sky. the only thing i could see were stars. there was nothing above me. i then noticed a small engine plane off in the distance coming from the east, heading towards my direction on the left side of the moon with a spotlight shinning at first to the north, then down onto the woods below it. i quickly reached down and grabbed my camera, tripod and all, and took a picture directly overhead of me where i felt the blast of cold air, where there were nothing but stars. then i looked to the east again and watched as the small plane made it���s way closer to me heading west, still spotlighting certain areas, including the sky. i took a couple of pictures of the plane, and watched it go out of view before going back to taking pictures of the full moon. later, when i came inside and downloaded my pictures i was stunned to see this image on the photo i had taken above my head where the cold air came from. where there was absolutely nothing in the sky but stars. as far as my dogs behavior, she was barking and pacing and breathing very fast a couple of different times during the entire time i was out. i remember this because it was so quiet out last night that when she did bark it startled me and i jerked the tripod, messing up on a couple of different shots of the moon. 

thanks,
michelle s.
content.summary: 3 objects in the night sky directly above me.

content.detailedDescription:
Driving with my daughter from san diego to orlando i sighted three 'orbs' at the top of a mountain as we drove toward gila bend.  joking with my daughter that there appeared to be ufos in the night, i thought they were tower beacons.  as we drove on the orbs reduced to two and were farther away, still joking with my daughter about ufos but i started wondering what they were.

as we came down the mountain the orbs appeared to flicker off and then a few seconds later with come back on.  at this point i asked my daughter to record them on the video camera and this is what we recorded.  we were still driving at a high rate of speed which makes the video 'shaky'.

when we reached orlando i remembered a history ufo show about the phoenix lights and that is what this reminds me of.  i also found out that luke afb is in the area and what i saw were 'targeting balloons' but a friend familiar with targeting balloons said they would last this long and wouldn't come back on!!
content.summary: Spheres (3) that faded out and then 'relit' -

content.detailedDescription:
Hello. my name is andrew maxwell and i am making this report to mufon on behalf of my mother, carla linton, 44, who described the details of her ufo encounter to me in person and over the phone. the encounter occurred at some date in late may 2006 (possibly the 31st), at approximately 10:30 p.M. atlantic canadian time, as descibed in the above form.

my mother lives in st. andrews, nb, about an hour and a half from where the ecounter occured. my brother rory linton, 14 years of age at the time of the encounter, is a hockey player on the aaa team the saint john seadogs (saint john is about an hour away from st. andrews). the seadogs play games and in tournaments all over the eastern seaboard of canada, and occasionally as far south as boston. to say that my mother and brother travel a lot is an understatement. on the night of their encounter, their travels had taken them to my home city of fredericton. they were leaving the city at the time of the encounter and first saw the ufo while driving back to st. andrews on the hanwell road just outside fredericton. the hanwell has little lighting and the skys are very clear at night, especially on nights where the moon is in the early stages of its cycle.

my mother noted the object and my brother saw it as well. according to her description, the object first appeared "like a star," "a defined circle" and "glowing"; it quickly became apparent, however, that it was not a normal heavenly body. my mother still insists upon a distinctly circular shape, even when i asked her if she meant instead that it was eliptical. it was glowing very brightly; when she told me this, she put emphasis on the words. it was quite clear that the glow was an abnormal sort of glow. it "moved eratically," in a manor dissimilar to that of an aircraft of normal origin. when asked how long the ufo was witnessed, she says for a very long time, at least 20 minutes, during which it could be viewed at all times. "we saw [the ufo] for 20 minutes or more--a long time!--and it stayed with us, in front of us," she says. there are few cars on the hanwell at night so it's quite possible that my mother was alone on the road for miles. eventually their trip just took them away from the ufo's location and it wasn't seen again once out of sight.

both my mother and i are aware that nb has very busy skys, perhaps amongst the busiest in north america, but it was clearly not a commercial plane of any sort. it was raised by my girlfriend that sattelites can move erratically in the fashion that is associated with ufos, but this was distinctly too close to the earth to be such an object. it is also of interest that fredericton is near the cfb gagetown military base, a notable canadian military base. however, my mother's account can still be taken quite at face value--she was an army brat, the daughter of an artillery commander, and growing up on numerous bases around north america. not only is she familar with standard military aircraft, but she has actually seen firsthand a secret military aircraft that she thought was a ufo but then learned of its true identity when it was revealed to her by her father after the project associated with it was declassified. she knows that what she saw was not of any known earthly origin.

thank you for reading this. if you have any questions, contact me, and i can contact my mother for you and return your call.
content.summary: Circular, glowing ufo making eratic movements; viewed over long period of time

content.detailedDescription: I kann omly german, i,m verry sorry!
content.summary: Armada from seven (7) orange colored objeckts. have contakt with, deskribed in my book ufos over freiburg

content.detailedDescription:
August 8th, 2006 / kirtland afb / flightline

approx. 7:15pm = as i moved around one of our aircraft in order to fuel it, i noticed a very bright light at an altitude near the clouds. this bright light was west of albuquerque and south of the volcanoes. initially, i thought it was an unusually bright star for this time of day since there was plenty of daylight left. i stopped what i was doing to observe the light/object since it was too unusual.

approx. 7:17pm = as i watched the light/object, it "blinked out" all of the sudden only to reappear north & above of the 1st location. i watched it again until approx. 7:20pm when it "blinked out" again.

approx. 7:20pm = the light/object reappeared south & below of the 1st location and i watched it until it once again "blinked out".

approx. 7:21pm = the light/object reappeared north of its 3rd location. i watched it once again until approx. 7:25pm when i diverted my attention to 2 f-18s taking off in an easterly direction, which then looped south and then west. i returned my attention to the direction of the light/object, but it was nowhere to be found. playing on a feeling that the f-18s were on an intercept course, i returned my attention to the jets.

approx. 7:26pm = both f-18s climbed altitude and continued heading west.

approx. 7:30pm = both f-18s ended up in the general area of the light/object's last location which was no longer in the area as far as i could tell.

note: for a better perspective of the sighting, the above mentioned volcanoes are roughly 10 miles away from me and the light/object appeared to be further out...Possibly 15 miles give or take a mile. i've been working on & around aircraft for around 16 years, and been flying in them for double that time, so if there's one thing i know it's aircraft. that sounds like a cliche doesn't it? the light/object was not any type of aircraft, nor could it have been a star. besides, why would 2 f-18s appear to "scramble" toward it if it was indeed nothing? i'm sorry i don't have a photo or video of the event. the military tends to frown upon cameras and video equipment on the flightline, so i did the next best thing and made as detailed a report as possible and i drew a sketch, but i no longer have a working scanner. i'll try to submit the sketch at a later date.

mufon field investigator trainee
content.summary: Bright object doing (maneuvers?) west of albuqueruque airport.

content.detailedDescription: The craft hovered over my house. it hovered then moved out slowly over the sky. then it shot out suddenly and disapeared. i felt honored to be able to see the craft.I feel that ufo's are real.
content.summary: I was told that i would have a ufo event by a child

content.detailedDescription: A transparent sphere is shown moving right to left at a slightly upward angle in this photo from the soho website. i've been checking this site daily for over a year and never saw anything like it before.
content.summary: Sphere in solar webcam photo
